name: NonflictCoach
0:
”Alexa launch nonflict coach”
”Alexa open nonflict coach”
”Alexa open nonflict coach and continue”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nonflict coach
des: The Nonflict Coach is an Alexa Skill to help people transform conflict into an opportunity for growth and peace with others and themselves. The assistant supports both conflict management facilitation between two parties and conflict management support and training for individuals interested in developing better positive communication skills.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
